amendment.description: Amendment sought to make an across-the-board reduction of 7.4831 percent bringing the level back to FY 2008 amounts. Defense accounts would have been excepted from the reduction.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce the amounts made available in the bill by 7.4831 percent except for amounts under the headings "National Nuclear Security Administration", "Environmental and Other Defense Activities", or " Defense Nuclear Facilities Safety Board".

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hudson amendment (A078) Failed by recorded vote: 131 - 289 (Roll no. 400).
